name: Track & Field (itch)
description:
The game was created during a London South Bank University Game Jam. We were required to remix/re-imagine a 80's/90's video game. We had to pull a game out of a hat and my team got Track and Field. We had a great team and delivered a good project, sadly we came second. 

Great fun, I remixed the theme tune and did the sound design. This is my 3rd ever video game I have had anything to do with.
